page.title: 05The Royal Oak,Commercial Rd.
page.content: Our group went to the{Royal Oak}on Commercial Road. We found that the pub was built in 1939 and therefore 46 years old.The person we interviewed was the landlord.The brewery was {Robinson of Stockport}who owned the pub. The opening hours were from 11 am. to 3 pm. There were six staff but at holiday time such as Christmas there were more.The customers are both young and old and there are a lot of regular customers at the Royal Oak. Most customers live locally and the oldest one is called Mary.She is 73 years of age. The most popular drink is{bitter.} They sell{bar snacks}at the bar and their{hot pies}are very popular. Every week there is{live {entertainment.}There are mixed teams for{Pool and Darts.
